title: Social Constructivist Collaborative Learning Design for Chemical Engineering Solid-State Process Education

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic chemical engineering theories and industrial field experience
context.additional_context: Program focused on learners assuming teaching roles to acquire practical instructional methods applicable to real educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain solid particle characterization, process design principles, and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners collaboratively develop chemical engineering solid operation education scenarios with peer teachers.
Learners design instructional modules utilizing social constructivist teaching methods (discussions, case studies, feedback cycles).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
